H0.text: Hydrocarbons are the long chains that free fatty acids, which are carboxylic acids, contain.

H1.text: Vapors are long chains contained in free fatty acids, which are carboxylic acids.

H2.text: Lipds are the long chains contained in free fatty acids, which are carboxylic acids.

H3.text: Particles are the long chains that free fatty acids, which are carboxylic acids, contain.

A4.text: Fatty acids have an aliphatic chain, which is either saturated or unsaturated.

A5.text: Fatty acids are a major component of the lipids (up to 70% by weight) in some species such as microalgae.
